name: Pauntlet
description:
Very early proof of concept and entirely based on DragonRuby's crafting example code.

One level and keyboard controls only

The mouse can be used to rearrange the game board at any time, but there is no save support

Features to add

Open source! (DragonRuby needs a simple board game starting point example)

Mobile web and app support

Enemy generators

Enemy movement

Bigger game board

Level editor

Random number seeding for deterministic level generation
